description: Allows you to update a gist's description and to update, delete, or rename gist files. Files from the previous version of the gist that aren't explicitly changed during an edit are unchanged.

parameters.name: gist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the gist.

files.description:
The gist files to be updated, renamed, or deleted. Each `key` must match the current filename
(including extension) of the targeted gist file. For example: `hello.py`.

To delete a file, set the whole file to null. For example: `hello.py : null`.

content.description: The new content of the file.

filename.description: The new filename for the file.

422.description: Validation failed, or the endpoint has been spammed.
